title: (Rioter Please Look Over This) Suggestion For the league client on MAC
body:
Sooo, i play league on my mac. And when the old league client was in place, i would have the client minimised but when one of my friends messaged me, the little icon on the dock would pop up and down. I really like this so i could actually know when my friends messaged me. Recently, one of my friends messaged me on the new client and i missed it. So im just asking if you rioters can please add this feature to the new client.
THANK YOU

replies.body: First of all, it's a notification system that Mac doesn't pick up on so they can't control it, second of all I know how to fix this. Download windows, don't use OSX.
